20.03.2014 SH SCR18789 Parts B/C/F/G Added test GNRL_MARKCODMAXCOMMEXCEEDED

added writing of row to joblog for every 1000th row (kind of monitoring)
29.01.2013 SH SCR17911 Part F: Removed range CLNT212_INVOICEBUYING = N

Parts B/C/F/G Added test GNRL_MARKCODLIMDENIED
09.07.2011 GB SCR16591 Fixed problem with blocks the invoices in the part G

16.05.2006 SH SCR11140 Added Part1A (only for GNRL_CODE = NL)

invoices (see GSET_ID = 174)

overdue invoices (see GSET_ID = 174)

not live with admin 1
A. Test not financed invoices caused by an existing value date <> invoice date
A1. Test not financed invoices caused by an invoice date in the future
//remove test on CALD only for the time we are not live with admin 1
//28-05-2003 JP SCR #3635 enable conditioned call to part "C" again
//additional where clause
... prepare Where clause for calc of overdue invoices
//blockade is no longer valid
//CLNT407_BLOCKPERCENTAGE=0 or DEBB_ACTINVAC<=0

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CAST (SUM(INVO_AACTUALC) AS DECIMAL (18,2)) FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 AND (:3)

Text.val: ... prepare Where clause for calc of overdue invoices
//invoices must be blocked

ExpSyntax.val: 'INVO_AACTUALI>0 AND (INVO_MAXFINANCETIMPASSED is null or INVO_MAXFINANCETIMPASSED <='&''''&DStr ({1,11},'YYYY-MM-DD')&''''&') AND INVO_MARKCODESPEC IN (0,'&Trim (Str ({1,7},'3'))&','&Trim (Str ({1,8},'3'))&','&Trim (Str ({1,5},'3'))&','&Trim (Str ({1,12},'3'))&','&Trim (Str ({1,23},'3'))&','&Trim (Str ({1,13},'3'))&','&Trim (Str ({1,14},'3'))&')'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CAST (SUM(INVO_AACTUALC) AS DECIMAL (18,2)) FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 AND (:3)
SELECT CAST (SUM(INVO_AACTUALC) AS DECIMAL (18,2)) FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 AND INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 AND INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :3 for fetch only

select INVO_NO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA_ACTASPECIAL from :1/INVO, :1/INVA, :1/CLNT where INVO_NO = INVA_NO and INVO_CURRENCY = INVA_CURRENCY and INVO_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and INVO_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :2 and not(exists (select * from :1/DCMC where DCMC_DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and DCMC_MARK_CODE = :2 and DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTH <> 0)) and CLNT212_INVOICEBUYING = 'N' :3
